name: Still Shining
description:
Content Warning!

This game mentions death, depression, drunk driving, and panic attacks. Please be advised while playing.

Story

A short story about you going off to stargaze on the cliffside. Soon, you're joined by a familiar face...

Still Shining contains:

  • 987 words
  • An original music track
  • Voice acting
  • 2 endings

Made within a week for O2A2 Jam 2022

Credits

Project Lead, Writer: Kristi "HusbandoGoddess" Jimenez

Editor, Programmer, Voice Director: Smoke Mirror Studios

Artist: MirukiMary

Voice of Cade: RitaRemixed

Audio Engineer: Cats on a Lilypad Studios

Composer: Jae

Graphic and Logo Artist: Maroondrops

Rounded Ren'Py GUI Kit: Novelkit

Sound Effect from: Zapsplat
